ARTICLE.TITLE: Hungary central bank says will not buy any govt bonds this week
ARTICLE.TEXT:
BUDAPEST, June 9 (Reuters) - Hungary’s central bank will not buy any government bonds from local banks this week, it said on Tuesday, scrapping its weekly tender for the second time since launching the purchases last month NBHT1, NBHT2.

The bank launched the tenders in early May as part of efforts to shore up the economy hit by the coronavirus pandemic. (Reporting by Krisztina Than)
